On the same day, the tenth day of the fourth month, proofread at the southern side of the same temple. The entire ten volumes were proofread by Shen Yuan. Using the text transmitted by Master Shenxian of Dizang Temple, the work was completed and proofread. It was then stored in the canon of Guan Zhi Temple. On the twenty-eighth day of the eighth month in the first year of the Kangen era (1169), the twenty-eighth year of the monk's life, fifty-eight years old in the secular world.
